Ingredients.2: 1 (1 ounce) package dry ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch®)

Ingredients.3: 1 (16 ounce) jar sliced pepperoncini peppers, drained

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Season chicken with ranch seasoning mix; place in bottom of large Dutch oven. Place pepperoncini peppers, butter, and 1/2 cup reserved pepper juice over chicken. Cover, and bake in preheated oven until chicken is fork tender, about 1 hour 30 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).

Directions.3: Let stand 5 minutes. Shred chicken using two forks.
